document_data.name: Karan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Karan''' was a scholar and tutor that lived in [[Candlekeep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|You have instructed and inspired me throughout my childhood and your heart would break to see what has just transpired here.|[[Abdel Adrian|Abdel]], to Karan after being assaulted by [[Carbos|an assassin]].}}
document_data.Relationships: Karan served as the tutor and mentor of sorts to [[Abdel Adrian]], the foster child of the [[sage]] [[Gorion]].
document_data.History: At some point in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Karan's likeness was assumed by a [[doppelganger]] that served the [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Sarevok]].
